Eve Martha Badana (amụrụ ya na abalị itolu na onwa nke asaa, na afo 1993) bụ onye mgbaru ọsọ bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-egwu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị maka DLR Waves
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Cork City mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum College Cork
Badana bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị mba Canada na-erubeghị afọ 17 na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's Cup, mana o kpebiri igwu egwu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Republic of Ireland na ọkwa dị elu
Ọ meriri okpu mbụ ya maka Ireland na February 2012.
Nne Badana sitere na County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, wee kwaga Ontario ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Belfast
N'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ nna Badana bụ onye Filipino
Badana nwere otu nwanne na otu nwanne
Badana bụ onye isi ndị otu mpaghara ya Unionville Milliken SC, wee sonye na Toronto Lady Lynx ebe a kpọkwara ya onye isi ma nyere ndị otu Under-20 aka iru eru maka asọmpi Super Y-League 2010
Na 2011, o kwetara a scholarships na Drexel University
Oge izizi Badana na bọọlụ kọleji hụrụ aha ya na otu egwuregwu Colonial Athletic Association (CAA) All-Rookie yana otu ọgbakọ nke abụọ
Na 27 Septemba 2016 Badana bịanyere aka na Cork City,  mgbe o kpebiri ịkwaga Ireland wee gụchaa akwụkwọ gbasara iwu na University College Cork
Na Cork City, ya na Amanda Budden gbara asọmpi maka mmalite
Badana nakweere ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu kwadoro na Dublin wee bịanye aka na DLR Waves n'oge 2019 Women's National League season
Mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Nwanna André Catholic High School n'obodo ya bụ Markham, Badana gara Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọzụzụ Mba dị na Ontario
Ọ batara n'uche ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Canada bụ ndị debanyere ya n'òtù ndị na -erubeghị afọ 17 nke mba
Badana bụ akụkụ nke nhọrọ Canada na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup

N'ịbụ onye ruru eru n'ihi nne mụrụ County Tyrone, Badana gakwuuru Football Association of Ireland banyere ịgbanwere mmekọ mba ụwa,  karịa Irish Football Association, bụ ndị otu mba ya na-anọchi anya ndị na-agba bọl na agbụrụ ma ọ bụ nne na nna si Northern Ireland ma nwee ikike
Nwa amaala Irish
Na Septemba 2011 a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Republic of Ireland maka egwuregwu ntozu UEFA Women's Euro 2013 megide Wales na France
Na mpụta mbụ ya na mba ụwa na February 2012, Badana gbara nkeji 90 nke Ireland 1–0 Algarve Cup meriri Hungary
Na ọnwa nke ise, na afọ 2012 Badana meriri okpu ọzọ dị elu na 1–0 enyi na enyi Switzerland meriri na Stadion Niedermatten  wee gosipụta nnọchi anya na 1–0 meriri South Africa na 2013 Cyprus Cup
Na 5 May 2014, onye njikwa Ireland Susan Ronan aha ya bụ Badana na ndị otu nnwale maka enyi na enyi megide obodo Basque
Badana malitere egwuregwu ahụ na mmeri 2–0 nke Ireland na Azpeitia, nke na-ekewaghị dị ka egwuregwu mba ụwa zuru oke
Ọ nọgidere na-amụ akwụkwọ, na-abụkarị onye a ma ama nke onye mgbaru ọsọ mbụ bụ Emma Byrne
N'ịgbaso ezumike nka mba Niamh Reid Burke na Machị 2021, akpọrọ Badana ka ya na ndị otu onye nchịkwa Ireland Vera Pauw zụọ maka egwuregwu enyi abụọ megide Denmark na Belgium
Ọ laghachiri na squad na June 2021 maka ọbụbụenyi abụọ megide Iceland, mana ọ ka nwere naanị okpu atọ na-esote mpụta mbụ ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri tupu mgbe ahụ
Badana nọchikwara anya Ireland na mbipụta 2013, 2015 na 2017 nke Summer Universiade
